product_name: Camaro Titanium Baselayer Wetsuit - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for layering under a full wetsuit, the Camaro Titanium Baselayer Wetsuit is made from 2mm-thick open cell SCS Titanium neoprene for a body-hugging fit that'll keep you comfortable in cold water. Titanium neoprene material greatly improves drying times-shake it out once and it is dry! Seams are glued and blind-stitched to be watertight. Wear the Camaro Titanium Baselayer Wetsuit when you're surfing, paddling or swimming. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for layering under a full wetsuit, the Camaro Titanium Baselayer Wetsuit is made from 2mm-thick open cell SCS Titanium neoprene for a body-hugging fit that'll keep you comfortable in cold water.
